Room.Name: The Davis Brothers Mortuary
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Davis Brothers Mortuary, viewing all the dead bodies.
Room.LongDescription: A mortuary isn't always the funnest place to visit. In fact, it's down- right boring. You might be able to find some friends who have died in battle in the Arena or have fallen down a mountain. The mortuary exits to the west onto Marina Way, and east to Eidenhoft Boulevard.
